nodes.excerpt: Getting the perfect name for your startup is obviously important. In fact, it's the first thing people notice when visiting our brand. But... it's a pain to find a great name/domain that's available. Now, it's time to forget that pain because we're here to help you.

localize.description: 为你的创业公司取一个完美的名字显然很重要。事实上，这是人们在访问我们的品牌时首先注意到的事情。但是......要找到一个可用的好名字/域名是一件很痛苦的事情。现在，是时候忘记这种痛苦了，因为我们是来帮助你的。

nodes.excerpt: Do you find yourself digging through email threads trying to find the version of a contract in which a specific change was introduced? Who proposed the change? Was it your lawyer, or your customer? If this pain is familiar, Version Story is here to help.

localize.description: 你是否发现自己在邮件中翻阅邮件线程，试图找到引入特定变更的合同版本？是谁提出的修改？是您的律师，还是您的客户？如果这种痛苦是熟悉的，版本故事在这里帮助你。

nodes.excerpt: Ponder guides you through daily journaling right from your new tab. With self-reflective prompts, fast keyboard shortcuts, aesthetic backgrounds, and privately-stored entries, you can just focus on writing — Ponder takes care of the rest.

nodes.excerpt: Looking to get genuine users on-board with minimum drop offs? Our offer includes identity verifications (KYC) for automating individual on-boarding and enhancing customer experience. We envision creating a trusted ecosystem where identity is the key to access.

localize.tagline: 在印度实现KYC自动化和身份验证。

localize.tagline: 在印度實現KYC自動化和身份驗證。

nodes.excerpt: TheProdcast is a technology podcast featuring seasoned product professionals, CEOs, Founders, and VCs. While our Season 1 focused on the stars behind stellar products that people love, Season 2 is all about impactful stories of promising women techologists.

localize.description: TheProdcast是一个由经验丰富的产品专家、CEO、创始人和VC组成的技术播客。我们的第一季聚焦于人们喜爱的明星产品背后的明星，第二季则是关于有前途的女性技术专家的影响故事。
localize.tagline: 一个以有影响力的技术和产品故事为主题的播客。

nodes.excerpt: End-to-end spend management for companies in LatAm. Issue unlimited physical or virtual cards, set limits for each, get real-time visibility of your team’s spend, and save valuable time on tedious tasks like invoice matching.

nodes.excerpt: FlashDrive NoOps app platform handles everything for you while you focus on your product. Made by developers for developers, FlashDrive is compatible with Git deployment (Github, Gitlabs etc...), DockerHub etc... Free backups, SSL certs. and load balancers.

localize.description: FlashDrive NoOps应用平台为你处理一切，而你则专注于你的产品。FlashDrive由开发者为开发者而生，兼容Git部署（Github、Gitlabs等...）、DockerHub等。免费备份，SSL证书.和负载平衡器。

nodes.excerpt: Each week, we find you the single best article to read next for getting better at your job. In our mobile app, you're grouped with people in your role at different companies who are reading the same thing. Features facilitate intimate peer-to-peer learning.

nodes.author: Erik Spangenberg

localize.description: 每周，我们都会为你找到下一篇最好读的文章，让你在工作中获得更好的发展。在我们的移动应用中，你会与不同公司中与你的角色相同的人进行分组，他们都在阅读同样的东西。功能方便点对点的亲密学习。
localize.tagline: 个性化的短板学习，让你在技术上更上一层楼

localize.description: 每週，我們都會爲你找到下一篇最好讀的文章，讓你在工作中獲得更好的發展。在我們的移動應用中，你會與不同公司中與你的角色相同的人進行分組，他們都在閱讀同樣的東西。功能方便點對點的親密學習。

nodes.excerpt: Candid helps companies resume screen applicants to find the best and filter out the rest. Is your resume good enough to pass a resume screening? See if you pass the test by trying our demo on our website by uploading your resume to get automated insights.

nodes.title: Alt - Invest in sports cards just like stocks
nodes.author: Alexis Ohanian

localize.description: Alt让您把您的运动卡收藏当作一个投资组合。您可以在我们的交易所购买和出售预认证卡，并通过我们的综合投资组合管理视图跟踪您所有资产的当前市场价值。
localize.tagline: 投资体育卡就像投资股票一样

localize.description: Alt讓您把您的運動卡收藏當作一個投資組合。您可以在我們的交易所購買和出售預認證卡，並通過我們的綜合投資組合管理視圖跟蹤您所有資產的當前市場價值。
localize.tagline: 投資體育卡就像投資股票一樣
